title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium: Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp: 117.5cm (46 1/4in.) Weft (selv. to selv.): 88.5cm (34 3/4in.)
Height of repeat: 39cm (15 1/4in.)
description:
Three scenes of children playing within a diamond floral grid. In red on white. 
Designed to be sewn together as a half-drop.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-206.
